price: 99. Ils seront suivis par une malédiction en ce bas monde et au Jour de la Résurrection. Horrible don qui leur sera donné !
arabic: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِۦ لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلرِّفۡدُ ٱلۡمَرۡفُودُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'biʿū fī hādhihi laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati bi'sa al-rif'du al-marfūdu
